ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard Training in Kunark
ygData.msgSnippet: Umm not true: There is a Bard Song Vendor in Kunark.  There aren t any trainers because we didn t get any skills after 50 (till 53).  Those skills that were
ygData.messageBody:
Umm not true:

There is a Bard Song Vendor in Kunark. There aren't any trainers because we
didn't get any skills after 50 (till 53). Those skills that were thrown in
were an after thought and the bards in the beta just went to kelethin on the
elven boat (or grabbed a gate/port) to train.

There is a high level song vendor in Kunark so there were bards in the beta
test of Kunark. By and large we don't have any Kunark specific issues
(except that of singing steel) and you can hardly expect 500-1000 beta
testers (I'm not really sure how many of us there were) to catch the singing
steel issue in a 5 week timeframe ;)

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath since Beta 2

----- Original Message -----
From: "Peck White" <pwhite@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 20, 2000 9:35 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Training in Kunark
